div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 43 Elis, 1918 (383) Burial: c. 400 B.C. (T) Contents: 4 EL, 12 AV Cyzicus: 4 EL Persia: 12 darics ANS 1944.100.73488 Disposition: Athens 12 (11 darics, 1 Cyzicus as v. Fritze 208); New York 1 (daric) Regling, ZfN 1931, p. 25 The bronze listed by Noe does not belong to the hd.
